Brenna is a web developer in Toronto.

I specialize in front-end dev, love to try new things, and sometime dip my toes in to the waters of design. Responsive design and modular CSS are my close companions.

I also contribute my heart and my code to Women && Tech and mentor with Ladies Learning Code
